name: Goal: £10m in sales/year of B2C product by year 5.

children.name: Provide Value Proposition
children.url: Investor Deck details value proposition and mission statement. Supported by Crowdfunding sales of $150000

children.name: Market Sizing
children.measurement: Delivered Document showing potential market size capable of supporting £10m in revenues over 5 years.
children.url: Global Survey - Forecast from 2017 to 2022 - Knowledge Sourcing Intelligence. Market Report - IHS Technology. Global Power Report - Xion Market Research.

children.name: Confirm Competence Needed
children.measurement: Investor deck details committed team members and advisors.

children.name: Confirm Team Formation
children.measurement: Investor Deck details committed team members fo advisors with full range of competencies required to take the business to profitability and meet financial projections.

children.name: Develop 6 Month Budget
children.measurement: Investment deck details 18 month financials and budget which is accepted by at least one investor for investment purposes.

children.name: Demonstrate Barriers to Entry
children.measurement: Patents and design drawings filed to protect core IP.

children.name: Provide Validated Go To Market Plan
children.measurement: Focus groups, and vendor in principle agreements or pre-orders to validate price points, sales volumes and margins. Measured in forecast net sales.

measurement: £10m in sales/year of B2C product by year 5.
